item.title: 华纳兄弟称两名独立董事在司法部调查后辞职
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司（Warner Bros Discovery）周一表示，独立董事史蒂文-米隆（Steven Miron）和史蒂文-纽豪斯（Steven Newhouse）已辞去媒体公司董事会的职务，立即生效。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery said on Monday that independent directors Steven Miron and Steven Newhouse have resigned from the media company's board, effective immediately.】

item.title: Citadel 的格里芬预计美国经济形势充满挑战，但对固定收益更为有利
item.description: 据路透社看到的一封信称，Citadel 对冲基金亿万富翁肯尼斯-格里芬（Kenneth Griffin）告诉投资者，他预计中期经济形势仍将充满挑战，但随着通胀缓解，对美国固定收益市场更为有利。【原文：Citadel's hedge fund billionaire Kenneth Griffin told investors he expects the medium-term economic landscape will remain challenging, but more favorable for fixed-income markets in the U.S., as inflation eases, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约州法院驳回作者要求阻止《纽约时报》等起诉 OpenAI 案件的申请
item.description: 周一，一群作家在加利福尼亚州起诉 OpenAI 侵犯版权，但未能说服纽约联邦法院停止审理《纽约时报》、作家协会和其他组织在曼哈顿提起的相关案件。【原文：A group of authors suing OpenAI for copyright infringement in California failed to convince a New York federal court on Monday to halt related cases brought in Manhattan by the New York Times, the Authors Guild and others.】

item.title: 纽约联储通胀指数显示 2 月份物价上涨压力减弱
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一表示，2 月份基本通胀压力减弱。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday that underlying inflation pressures weakened in February.】

item.title: OpenAI 无需注册即可访问 ChatGPT
item.description: 由微软支持的初创公司OpenAI周一表示，从下周一开始，用户无需注册即可使用其免费使用的ChatGPT生成式人工智能聊天机器人。【原文：OpenAI will start allowing users to access its free-to-use ChatGPT generative AI chatbot without needing to sign up for the service beginning Monday, the Microsoft -backed startup said on Monday.】

item.title: 惠誉称：UnitedHealth 部门遭黑客攻击不会对非营利性医院造成信用影响
item.description: 惠誉评级机构周一表示，UnitedHealth 的技术部门 Change Healthcare 遭到网络攻击，导致全美药房服务中断，惠誉预计这不会对美国非营利性医院造成任何信用影响。【原文：Fitch does not anticipate any credit impact on not-for-profit hospitals in the United States from the cyberattack at UnitedHealth's tech unit Change Healthcare that caused disruption to pharmacies across the U.S., the ratings agency said on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗银行将在纽约裁员 363 人
item.description: 花旗集团周一表示，其主要银行部门花旗银行将在纽约裁员 363 人。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday its primary banking unit Citibank will lay off 363 employees in New York.】

item.title: OpenAI 取消山姆-奥特曼对其创业基金的所有权
item.description: 根据向美国证券交易委员会（SEC）提交的一份文件，OpenAI 改变了其支持人工智能初创企业的风险投资基金的治理结构，因此其知名首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）不再拥有或控制该基金。【原文：OpenAI has changed the governance structure of its venture capital fund that backs AI startups, so its high profile chief executive Sam Altman no longer owns or controls the fund, according to a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).】

item.title: Teva 和 Viatris 赢得挑战 J&J 精神分裂症药物专利的新机会
item.description: Teva Pharmaceutical 和 Viatris 周一说服了美国一家上诉法院，重新启动了对强生精神分裂症特效药专利的挑战，为它们推出更廉价的仿制药扫清了道路。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical and Viatris convinced a U.S. appeals court on Monday to revive their challenges to a patent covering a blockbuster Johnson & Johnson schizophrenia drug, giving them a new chance to clear a path to launch cheaper generic versions of the medicine.】

item.title: 美国股票基金连续第五周资金流入
item.description: 截至 3 月 27 日的七天内，美国投资者连续第五周净买入股票型基金，原因是他们维持了对今年三次降息的预期，尽管在通胀报告公布前的谨慎态度限制了购买量。【原文：U.S. investors were net buyers of equity funds for a fifth successive week in the seven days to March 27 as they maintained expectations of three interest rate cuts this year, although caution ahead of an inflation report capped purchases.】

item.title: 弗吉尼亚州监管机构批准多米尼克能源公司太阳能项目
item.description: 弗吉尼亚州公用事业监管机构周五批准了总发电量达 764 兆瓦的新太阳能项目，这将扩大 Dominion Energy 在该州的清洁能源投资组合。【原文：Virginia utility regulators on Friday approved new solar projects with a total of 764 MW electricity capacity that will expand Dominion Energy's clean energy portfolio in the U.S. state.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司预计波音交付延迟将影响今年的飞机使用率
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周一表示，波音公司推迟交付飞机将影响其今年的飞机使用率。【原文：United Airlines on Monday said delays in aircraft deliveries from Boeing will impact its aircraft utilization this year.】

item.title: 全球股票基金连续第五周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至 3 月 27 日的七天内，全球股票基金连续第五周吸引资金流入，因为在瑞士国家银行出人意料地提前降息后，投资者修正了对主要央行降息时间的预期。【原文：Global equity funds attracted inflows for a fifth successive week in the seven days to March 27 as investors revised expectations on the timing of rate cuts by major central banks after the Swiss National Bank surprised with an early cut.】

item.title: 专家小组称 FAA 应终止要求飞行员披露谈话治疗过程的规定
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局任命的一个专家小组周一表示，该机构应放弃要求航空公司飞行员和空中交通管制员公开谈话治疗过程的规定。【原文：An expert panel appointed by the Federal Aviation Administration said Monday the agency should drop a requirement that airline pilots and air traffic controllers disclose talk therapy sessions.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份建筑支出连续第二个月下降
item.description: 由于非住宅和公共项目的疲软抵消了单户住宅建设的强劲势头，2 月份美国建筑支出意外下降。【原文：U.S. construction spending unexpectedly fell in February as strength in single-family homebuilding was more than offset by weaknesses in nonresidential and public projects.】

item.title: 特朗普的媒体公司在引发持续经营质疑后下跌
item.description: 在完成与空头支票公司 Digital World Acquisition Corp.的合并几天后，Truth 社交平台的母公司 Trump Media & Technology Group 的股价周一下跌超过 15%，原因是该公司让人怀疑可能无法履行其财务责任。【原文：Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group fell over 15% on Monday after it raised doubts that the parent firm of Truth Social platform might not be able to meet its financial liabilities, days after completing its merger with blank check firm Digital World Acquisition Corp.】

item.title: 美国制造业 1 年半以来首次实现增长
item.description: 由于生产大幅反弹和新订单增加，美国制造业在 3 月份实现了 1 年半以来的首次增长，但工厂就业依然低迷，投入品价格推高。【原文：U.S. manufacturing grew for the first time in 1-1/2 years in March as production rebounded sharply and new orders increased, but employment at factories remained subdued and prices for inputs pushed higher.】

item.title: 欧佩克 3 月石油产量下降，伊拉克居首 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周一的调查显示，欧佩克（OPEC）上月石油产量下降，反映出伊拉克和尼日利亚的出口量减少，而一些成员国正在与更广泛的欧佩克+（OPEC+）联盟达成自愿减产协议。【原文：OPEC oil output fell last month, a Reuters survey found on Monday, reflecting lower exports from Iraq and Nigeria against a backdrop of ongoing voluntary supply cuts by some members agreed with the wider OPEC+ alliance.】

item.title: Twilio 任命 Sachem Head 合伙人 Andy Stafman 加入董事会
item.description: 云通信公司 Twilio 周一表示，该公司已任命 Sachem Head Capital Management 的一名合伙人进入董事会，因为该公司正面临着几家激进投资公司要求其进行重大变革的压力。【原文：Cloud communications company Twilio has appointed a partner at Sachem Head Capital Management to its board, it said on Monday, as it faces pressure from several activist investment firms to make significant changes.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Coppel 集团将在 2024 年投资超过 7 亿美元以扩大商店网络
item.description: 墨西哥零售商和贷款机构 Grupo Coppel 周一发表声明称，该公司计划今年投资超过 120 亿墨西哥比索（约合 7.26 亿美元），以加强其商店网络并减少对环境的影响。【原文：Mexican retailer and lender Grupo Coppel plans to invest more than 12 billion Mexican pesos ($726 million) this year to boost its store network and reduce its environmental footprint, it said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 奥地利 RHI Magnesita 公司将收购美国氧化铝生产商 Resco 公司
item.description: 总部位于维也纳的耐火材料制造商 RHI Magnesita 计划收购美国氧化铝和耐火材料生产商 Resco Group，两家公司表示，收购的企业价值最高可达 4.3 亿美元。【原文：Vienna-based fireproof materials maker RHI Magnesita plans to buy Resco Group, a U.S.-based producer of alumina and refractories for an enterprise value of up to $430 million, the companies said.】

item.title: 反对派赢得大选后土耳其股市攀升，里拉处于低位
item.description: 土耳其反对党在地方选举中大胜总统塔伊普-埃尔多安领导的 AK 党（AKP），土耳其股市周一上涨，里拉兑美元汇率在创下历史新低后小幅走软。【原文：Turkish stocks rose on Monday and the lira weakened slightly after hitting its record low against the dollar after the political opposition logged a thumping victory over President Tayyip Erdogan's AK Party (AKP) in local elections.】

item.title: 俄罗斯股市创两年多来新高
item.description: 周一，俄罗斯基准股指升至自 2022 年 2 月俄罗斯出兵乌克兰以来的最高点，卢布兑美元汇率小幅走强。【原文：Russia's benchmark stock index strengthened to its highest point since the day Russia sent its troops into Ukraine in February 2022 on Monday, while the rouble firmed slightly against the U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 通胀走软迹象增强降息希望，期货上涨
item.description: 美国股指期货周一上涨，因为最新公布的通胀数据显示消费者价格趋缓，这增强了美联储提前降息的希望。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Monday after the latest inflation print showed moderating consumer prices, bolstering hopes of an early interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: UPS 将成为美国邮政的主要航空货运供应商
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司周一表示，经过一段过渡期后，该公司将成为美国邮政服务公司（USPS）的主要航空货运供应商。【原文：United Parcel Service will become the United Stated Postal Service's (USPS) primary air cargo provider, after a transition period, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 第一季度对比特币的关注掩盖了美国 ETF 格局的扩大
item.description: 第一季度，现货比特币交易所交易基金（ETF）的诞生和对人工智能新投资方式的探索盖过了更广泛的ETF市场的其他趋势，但分析师们表示，单一国家ETF和债券ETF等其他主题可能会在2024年之前持续发酵。【原文：The birth of spot bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and the quest for new ways to invest in the artificial intelligence overshadowed other trends in the broader ETF market in the first quarter, but analysts say other themes like single-country ETFs and bond ETFs are likely to play out through 2024.】

item.title: 美国信贷需求旺盛推动第二季度经济增长
item.description: 投资者争相在美联储降息前锁定收益，预计这将使美国企业债券市场的涨势持续到第二季度，一位策略师称，这可能会触及三十年来从未见过的水平。【原文：An investor scramble to lock in returns before the Federal Reserve cuts rates is expected to sustain a rally in the U.S. corporate bond market into the second quarter, with one strategist saying it may touch levels not seen in three decades.】

item.title: 聚焦：马斯克声誉下降，特斯拉潜在买家嗤之以鼻
item.description: 市场情报公司 Caliber 的一项调查显示，美国特斯拉的潜在购买者队伍正在缩小。【原文：The ranks of would-be Tesla buyers in the United States are shrinking, according to a survey by market intelligence firm Caliber, which attributed the drop in part to CEO Elon Musk's polarizing persona.】

item.title: 早间竞标制造业拉开就业周序幕
item.description: 阿曼达-库珀（Amanda Cooper）对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Baltika 公司起诉嘉士伯子公司，要求赔偿损失 9 亿多美元
item.description: 俄罗斯法院的文件显示，俄罗斯巴尔蒂卡啤酒公司（Baltika Breweries）起诉了嘉士伯的四家子公司，要求赔偿损失 62.4 亿丹麦克朗（约合 9.0219 亿美元），双方正在为俄罗斯最大啤酒制造商的未来而争论不休。【原文：Russia's Baltika Breweries has sued four Carlsberg subsidiaries for damages amounting to 6.24 billion Danish crowns ($902.19 million), Russian court filings showed, as the two parties fight over the future of Russia's largest brewer.】
